description: If a pencil character wasn’t enough these kaomojis have an actual hand holding a pencil character for their writing. Depending on your browser or device, these hands may appear as small text characters or giant, yellow hands. If they are yellow, then these hands are giant compared to the emoticon’s face but it still looks pretty cool. It’s always nice to make use of the fancy characters like these. ✍(΄◞ิ౪◟ิ‵) ௸˓˓✍(ீଞீ๑) ✉✍(ග⍛ග੭ ✍(・∀・＠) “✍ʕ•ᴥ•oʔ ✍(´ω｀●) ＿✍(￣ー￣ ) ✍(´ω｀●) ….✍(･ω･。) _✍(･_･｡) ✍(・∀・＠) …✍(・Å・｀ｏ)ノ ＿✍(´∀｀●) _✍(･_･｡) [≡] ✍(・⺫・‶) _✍(-c_,-。) ✍(-∀・○) ✍(´ι _` 　) ❣ฺ✍ฺ（◕ฺｖ◕ฺ）✌ฺ
title: Writing with an Actual Hand Holding a Pencil
